body:
Neat... Looks like a bug in the XDR package.

```
Panic at 2015-04-08T09:29:08+02:00
panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range

goroutine 81 [running]:
github.com/calmh/xdr.(*Reader).ReadBytesMaxInto(0x13570480, 0x40, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/calmh/xdr/reader.go:79 +0x58b
github.com/calmh/xdr.(*Reader).ReadStringMax(0x13570480, 0x40, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/calmh/xdr/reader.go:41 +0x58
github.com/syncthing/protocol.(*Option).DecodeXDRFrom(0x12aec600, 0x13570480, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/message_xdr.go:951 +0x40
github.com/syncthing/protocol.(*Device).DecodeXDRFrom(0x134a6b40, 0x13570480, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/message_xdr.go:870 +0x195
github.com/syncthing/protocol.(*Folder).DecodeXDRFrom(0x1345a140, 0x13570480, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/message_xdr.go:755 +0x11e
github.com/syncthing/protocol.(*ClusterConfigMessage).DecodeXDRFrom(0x12dabd9c, 0x13570480, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/message_xdr.go:638 +0x164
github.com/syncthing/protocol.(*ClusterConfigMessage).UnmarshalXDR(0x12dabd9c, 0x12b4c900, 0x204, 0x204, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/message_xdr.go:629 +0x117
github.com/syncthing/protocol.(*rawConnection).readMessage(0x13850000, 0x0, 0x1, 0x0, 0x7301, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/protocol.go:450 +0xb8b
github.com/syncthing/protocol.(*rawConnection).readerLoop(0x13850000, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/protocol.go:295 +0x116
created by github.com/syncthing/protocol.NewConnection
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/protocol.go:167 +0x283
```
Ah. I think this is a 32 bit only bug, caused by talking to a v0.10 syncthing on the other side.

Also,

> Windows 7 64bit, syncthing v0.11.0-beta4 (go1.4.2 windows-386 default)

Don't run the 386 build on 64 bit Windows. That sucks. :)

> Don't run the 386 build on 64 bit Windows. That sucks. :)

I just needed to check renamed API calls and didn't actually cared which version will I grab :)
And in this case it nailed a bug, so that's something. :)

issue.title: crash code 2, beacon.NewMulticast  --> panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range
issue.body:
Syncthing v0.10.30, S-Android v0.5.28, Android 5.1

Syncthing crashes after about 30 seconds of running.
Fresh setup, got 1 device connected and 0 shares.

Catlog: http://pastebin.com/GwaDeY88

```
04-12 11:11:57.620: W/SyncthingNativeCode(17844): created by github.com/syncthing/protocol.NewConnection
04-12 11:11:57.620: W/SyncthingNativeCode(17844):   /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/Syncthing-Android-Release/workspace/ext/syncthing/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/syncthing/protocol/protocol.go:158 +0x344
04-12 11:11:57.630: I/chromium(17844): [INFO:CONSOLE(103)] "UIOffline", source: http://127.0.0.1:3005/scripts/syncthing/core/controllers/syncthingController.js (103)
04-12 11:11:57.630: E/SyncthingNativeCode(17844): Syncthing binary crashed with error code 2
04-12 11:11:57.889: W/GetTask(17844):   at com.nutomic.syncthingandroid.syncthing.b.a(Unknown Source)
04-12 11:11:57.889: W/GetTask(17844):   at com.nutomic.syncthingandroid.syncthing.b.doInBackground(Unknown Source)
```

Another logcat: (SyncthingNativeCode:v)
http://pastebin.com/ssBRpb8b

```
W/SyncthingNativeCode(19072): panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range
W/SyncthingNativeCode(19072): goroutine 67 [running]:
W/SyncthingNativeCode(19072): github.com/calmh/xdr.(*Reader).ReadBytesMaxInto(0x10bf20c0, 0x20, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
W/SyncthingNativeCode(19072):   /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/Syncthing-Android-Release/workspace/ext/syncthing/src/github.com/syncthing
...
...
W/SyncthingNativeCode(19072):   /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/Syncthing-Android-Release/workspace/ext/syncthing/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/beacon/beacon.go:24 +0xa0
W/SyncthingNativeCode(19072): created by github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/beacon.NewMulticast
E/SyncthingNativeCode(19072): Syncthing binary crashed with error code 2
```

issue.title: panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range

labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion
